bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with nu rou 弩肉 , tumorous flesh-growth. Hai yao ben cao 海藥本草 Substance Entry ke 珂：主 消翳膜及筋弩肉，並刮點之 , “It is in control of dissolving shade membranes and sinew tumorous flesh-growths . Do both smear and drop [liquid] on them”. Jin ren fu shang 金刃斧傷 , injury inflicted by metal [objects , such as] blade and hatchet [1] Pathological Condition of BCGM 金瘡 金瘡 , sores inflicted by metal objects, resulting from the impact of a blade or hatchet. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry li 栗 quotes Bin hu ji jian fang 瀕湖集簡方 : 金刃斧傷：用獨殼大栗研傅 , “For injury inflicted by metal [objects, such as] blade and hatchet , use the largest chestnut kernel, grind it and apply externally”.
